Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Antiche Figure, you'll be centrally located in Venice, steps from Scalzi Bridge and minutes from Papadopoli Gardens. This hotel is close to Rialto Bridge and St. Mark's Basilica.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 22 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms feature shower/tub combinations, complimentary toiletries, and bidets. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.

Dining
Enjoy a bite to eat at a coffee shop/café, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and an elevator (lift).


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a bite to eat at a coffee shop/café, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Hotel Antiche Figure, you'll be centrally located in Venice, steps from Scalzi Bridge and minutes from Papadopoli Gardens. This hotel is close to Rialto Bridge and St. Mark's Basilica.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Scalzi Bridge - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Papadopoli Gardens - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Scuola Grande di San Giovanni Evangelista - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Tolentini - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi

Palazzo Labia - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Piazzale Roma - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Church of St. Roch - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Guglie Bridge - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Guglie Waterbus - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Fondaco of Turks - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Venetian Museum of Natural History - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
St. Mary of the Friars - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Confraternity of St. Roch - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Frari Square - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Antiche Figure is Venice (VCE-Marco Polo) - 7.3 km / 4.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
